step1.title: Your Personal Intelligence Vault
step1.description: Noteece is your encrypted personal knowledge base that learns from your data to help you work smarter.

step2.title: Foresight 3.0 Intelligence
step2.description: Advanced correlation engine that synthesizes your tasks, time, health, and finance data into actionable insights.

step3.title: Seamless Local Sync
step3.description: Sync securely between your devices on your local network. No cloud required.

step4.title: Physical-Digital Bridge
step4.description: Use NFC tags and geofencing to blend your digital and physical workflows.
